# jsonRepresentation()

**Instance Method**

Returns the contents of the exception reason in JSON format.

## Declaration

```swift
func jsonRepresentation() -> Data
```

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSData] object containing the JSON representation of the metrics in the payload.

## Generating a report

- **dictionaryRepresentation()**
